name: किस्सागोई - लघु कथा लेखन
long_description: "एक व्यक्ति अपनी खुद की एक दुनिया का निर्माण कर सकता है और उसके अंदर उतना ही पोषण कर सकता है जितना कि कोई और"। अल्फ़ाज़ के अंतर्गत आयोजित लघु कथा लेखन कार्यक्रम में किसी व्यक्ति को मौके पर उपलब्ध कराए गए विषय के आधार पर एक छोटी कहानी लिखनी होगी।

name: Du coeur - Micro Story Writing
long_description: "One can build a world of his own and nurture inside it as much as one can". Micro story writing is an event in which an individual has to write a short story based on the theme provided on the spot.

name: Fade in - English poetry Writing
long_description: A poem defines the very sense of serenity and provides evasion from the idea of materialism.Poetry is when an emotion has found its thought and the thought has found words. Fade in encourages the audience to express their minds freely and experience a sense of escapism through poetry.

name: काव्यांजलि - हिंदी कविता लेखन
long_description: एक कविता शांति की भावना को परिभाषित करती है और भौतिकवाद के विचार से अभिव्यक्ति प्रदान करती है। कविता तब होती है जब एक भावना ने अपना विचार पाया है और विचार ने शब्द पाए हो। काव्यांजलि दर्शकों को अपने मन को स्वतंत्र रूप से व्यक्त करने के लिए प्रोत्साहित करती है।

name: Fan Fiction
long_description: If you wonder how changing a certain part of your favourite book, movie or TV show could make it so much better, this is a platform for you. A fanfiction is a story based on characters or settings from another’s work. It encourages one to become a skillful writer and a thoughtful reader.

name: Mic Check- An Open Mic event.
long_description: An open mic is a live show at which audience members who are amateur or professional may perform on stage, often for the first time, or to promote an upcoming performance. It is a great platform to boost your confidence and presentation skills that make you stand out of the crowd.

name: Spell Bee
long_description: Let grammar, punctuation, and spelling into your life! Even the most energetic and wonderful mess has to be turned into sentences. The purpose of spell bee is to help improve spelling, increase vocabularies, learn concepts and develop correct English usage that will help participants to communicate better.

name: Guess the Gibberish - How Lit are you? (Fun Events)
long_description: In ‘Guess the Gibberish’ a player guesses a word or phrase which are gibberish and answer it before the timer goes off.

name: PUNTENDED - How Lit are you? (Fun Events)
long_description: We all love and appreciate good humor, and everyone knows there is no better way to showcase your humor in one-liner formats than Puns.So here's Puntended.You only need to follow Alfaaz on Twitter and stay prepared with your best set of Puns.
